title: Johnson & Johnson 's net income 2005 to 2019
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: In 2019 , Johnson Johnson received gross Johnson for 15119 units of its & narrow-body jet airliner series , but net Johnson after cancellations and changes ( under the ASC 606 revenue recognition standard ) came to a devastating negative 183 units .
The slump in net Johnson came as a result of the jet maker 's & MAX crisis .
Johnson Johnson delivered some 18 units of its & income to Delta Air Lines in 2017 .
gold: Johnson & Johnson 's revenues have generally been increasing over the last several years . As of 2019 , Johnson & Johnson 's total net income was estimated to be about 15.12 billion U.S. dollars . This is a slight decrease from the previous year when net income was at about 15.3 billion U.S. dollars .
